summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3752 forthe improvement of East 53rd Street and East 53rd Street Produced, from 26th Avenue Northeast to 30th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, under Ordinance No. 46135, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
